sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { PictureService } from 'src/app/services/picture.service'; import { Picture } from 'src/app/shared/models/Pictures'; @Component({ selector: 'app-picture-page', templateUrl: './picture-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./picture-page.component.css'] }) export class PicturePageComponent implements OnInit{ pictureService!: PictureService; showPicture(){ this.pictureService.getAll() .subscribe((data: Picture) =>{ id: data.id; url: data.url; alt: data.alt; }); } ngOnInit():void{ }}
